name: Scavenger
overview: The space station Zenith X has just exploded, releasing its cargo: thousands of priceless gems into the cosmos.It is your job to scavenge as many of these gems as possible, but there's a catch. There's always a catch. All the gems are floating inside a huge asteroid storm, which is also inhabited by hostile aliens. It is up to you to fly across 20 different sectors, gathering as many gems as you can. Your commander will update you on how many gems are detected in each sector.
